Package com.uddernetworks.emojide.data.document

Interface DocumentManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDocumentManager
    public interface DocumentManager

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Document> createDocument​(java.lang.String name, long authorId)
      Creates and inserts a Document with the given parameters and with empty content.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List<Document>> getAllDocuments()
      Gets all Documents in the database.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<Document>> getDocument​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the Document with the given unique name, if it exists.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> removeDocument​(Document document)
      Removes a given Document from the database.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> updateDocument​(Document document)
      Inserts a given Document's contents to the database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllDocuments

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.List<Document>> getAllDocuments()
        Gets all Documents in the database. This is not cached due to the relative slowness of the IDE, so this will not be called many times. See implementation for exceptions that may occur with this rule.
        Returns:
        All Documents

      • getDocument

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<Document>> getDocument​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the Document with the given unique name, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to fetch
        Returns:
        The Document, if existent

      • createDocument

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Document> createDocument​(java.lang.String name,
                                                                long authorId)
        Creates and inserts a Document with the given parameters and with empty content.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Document
        authorId - The author's Discord ID of the Document
        Returns:
        The Document's CompletableFuture

      • updateDocument

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> updateDocument​(Document document)
        Inserts a given Document's contents to the database.
        Parameters:
        document - The Document to get the content of
        Returns:
        The CompletableFuture of the task

      • removeDocument

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Void> removeDocument​(Document document)
        Removes a given Document from the database.
        Parameters:
        document - The Document to remove
        Returns:
        The CompletableFuture of the task
